full_text: Case 1:20-cr-00330-AJN Document 22 Filed 07/13/20 Page 19 of 19 Dated: New York, New York July 13, 2020 CONCLUSION The Government respectfully submits that the defendant is an extreme risk of flight. As set forth above, the defendant cannot meet her burden of overcoming the statutory presumption in favor of detention. There are no conditions of bail that would assure the defendant's presence in court proceedings in this case. Accordingly, any application for bail should be denied. Respectfully submitted, AUDREY STRAUSS Acting United States Attorney By: Alison Moe Alex Rossmiller Mailee Conley Assistant United States Attorneys (212) 637-2225 18 DOJ-OGR-00001629

text_blocks.content: Dated: New York, New York July 13, 2020

The Government respectfully submits that the defendant is an extreme risk of flight. As set forth above, the defendant cannot meet her burden of overcoming the statutory presumption in favor of detention. There are no conditions of bail that would assure the defendant's presence in court proceedings in this case. Accordingly, any application for bail should be denied.
AUDREY STRAUSS Acting United States Attorney
By: Alison Moe Alex Rossmiller Mailee Conley Assistant United States Attorneys (212) 637-2225
